website_summaries.verdict: The Marshall Mid Bluetooth on-ear headphones deliver excellent deep bass response and solid clarity in the highs, in a well-implemented, comfortable design.
pros: Strong audio performance with deep, rich bass balanced with clear, well-defined highs
cons: Audio purists will find the sound signature too sculpted

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: F*****g amazing piece of equipment. Pro tip : if you are using Spotify as your main music player don't forget to go under settings and set music streaming and download quality to extreme, then you will see these bad boys go to work. Pro: - They look amazing - They sound amazing - Top notch Bluetooth connectivity - Battery holds for ages.. i don't even remember when I last charged them Cons: - Maybe the clamp is a bit too tight on the ears.. takes a week or so to get used to
customer_reviews.author: Razvan Stanica

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones- shame about build quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three times - one due to wrong delivery( Amazon's fault) and twice the gold button on the left inside of the headband has fallen/broken off ( see photo)- although cosmetic I did not expect this for the price and so returned twice. Neither seller nor Amazon have taken much responsibility or seem overly concerned. I'm now stuck with no headphones. However I will say headphones are great- amazing sound, incredible battery life and look great, only negative was I found the bluetooth stuttered a little when walking fast. Further I won't be purchasing from this seller nor amazon for headphones and will now go direct.
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Having spent 2 weeks researching which headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Having spent 2 weeks researching which headphones to get, I was not disappointed with my selection. Very comfortable. I was initially cautious about music leaking from headphones since I travel on the tube, but its amazing and there is no sound leakage. Being the first expensive headphones I have bought I can say that it was definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gurpreet Sachdeva

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a small head - a pinhead almost - but these headphones were so tight that I had to send them back. It's a shame because the sound and noise cancellation is impressive. The amplifier design is a little bit cheesy too!!
customer_reviews.author: Smokey Bacon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, avoid, avoid!! Fake Merchandise!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend, I have had this product for just a few days past the return point and when the ANC mode is activated there is a loud crackling in the right ear, rendering the ANC mode redundant, extremely disappointing. Update: After speaking to Marshall themselves they requested some details on the product, including the QR code on the internal of the product. The one I submitted did not match what Marshall expected meaning the product is fake. I have since contacted Amazon Customer Services who have agreed to refund the product.
customer_reviews.author: GavBrand

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.text: They look good and sound good but that’s where the good stuff ends. The noise cancelling does not work at all and the battery failed after a couple of months where it charges but then runs down within a couple of hours. This is the fourth pair of Marshall headphones and they are the first that disappointed me. I am in the process or sorting out a refund and not sure if I’ll buy Marshall again.
customer_reviews.author: Jameskenny

customer_reviews.title: absolutely unbeatable sound
customer_reviews.text: I have never given a review in 4 hours, but you see, for these headphones, which literally blew my mind away, I had to. I have a few great headphones, but nothing, none of them, comes even close to this. The box was not nicely packed by Amazon, therefore have to wait and see if there were any damages or not.
customer_reviews.author: Gourav Sengupta

customer_reviews.title: Really good headset - sound is top!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these - I had some issues connecting to multiple devices, I contacted Amazon and Marshall for support and they helped. Make sure you: 1. Activate the Bluetooth feature on your sound source, according to its user manual and be sure it isn't already connected to different Bluetooth device. 2. Start with the headphones OFF. 3. Press and hold the control button continuously (approximately 10 seconds) and watch the LED change from OFF to WHITE to DARK BLUE to indicate Bluetooth Pairing Mode is activated. 4. Do the same with another device After the initial pairing, the two devices will auto-connect when they are switched on and within range of each other (10 meters).
customer_reviews.author: Silvia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, choose a good seller.
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation - just right amount. Useful while traveling in the train. Haven't used it in a flight. Sound quality - very good. As expected for this brand. My only jibe is that the headphones presses a bit hard against your ears - expected for an on the ear headphone. But I found it a bit discomfort after wearing it for more than an hour. Heard about a lot of fake products being sold in Amazon. So select a seller with a good rating, don't go for default one. I went for a UK based seller with high rating, I received a genuine product. Happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: NKris

customer_reviews.title: good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that its small form shape would be uncomfortable and probably would compromise the sound delivery and anc (active noise reduction) effect. Fortunately, I was wrong. The headphones are quite confortable, light and yet they fit quite well around my head (and it is not small). The anc effect is not superb but we notice some effect (there are better options if noise cancellation is important). The sound quality is good and we can easy set it with bluetooth connection with ios devices ( i didn't test yet with other devices). The package is a work of art and it comes with a clean and light case (rectangular shape).
customer_reviews.author: rmoreira

customer_reviews.title: Marshall Mid Hurts My Ear
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphone, but it hurts my right ear after 3 mins of use. After 1 hour of use, I just couldn't bare the pain I was feeling on my right ear. It seems to be pressing hard on my ear's artery. Unfortunately, I have returned the product to Amazon, today. I bought the headphone because I wanted a comb wireless and wired headphone to replace my Beyerdynamic DT250 headphone (80 OHM) I have been using since 2011. Unfortunately, Marshall Mid Bluetooth headphone pales in comparison to Beyerdynamic DT250 particularly in terms of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: bberlinn

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: seriously good earphones at a great price. Forget looking at online reviews for headphones which all list the same handful of products (at either dirt cheap or extremely expensive prices). Be original and make your own mind up. The anc works great, the bluetooth works great and you can recharge them and dont have to buy endless batteries .
customer_reviews.author: S. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE SUPERB, GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price of some other Bluetooth headphones these really are excellent value for money, the sound quality is fantastic, they are neat and comfortable on. Havent really fully tried out the noise cancelling function but from what i have tried so far they are fine. I think they would be excellent for travel. They come in a really cool carry box and a funky cable to plug them in with. Really excellent headphones i'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: REBELGUIDE

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MARSHALLS. I purchase to be able to use on my solo trips since I don’t live without music. The battery life is great. Only difficulty was to find the way to turn on the wireless set up. I had to speak to an online assistant from the brand since it was difficult to understand ok the box. You just need to turn it on and then keep pressing the bottle until the light turns blue! Then you can connect your device
customer_reviews.author: eduarda concon

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and simple to connect.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were bought for me as a present and I really love them. They have quite a lot of adjustability in the fit and you can switch the noise cancelling facility off if you want to. They connect to the phone like a car set up so that the sound turns off if the phone rings. Great sound. I can immerse myself in the music whilst I exercise so it is helping me to keep on track.
customer_reviews.author: E L Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality headphones, the sound is clear as a bell, it's really pleasant to listen to music - very deep and rich sound. Headphones look very stylish and the battery life is great, even with the noise cancellation on. The noise cancellation itself is fine, I feel like the headphones are cancelling out the noise even without having it having switched on. They fit quite tightly against my head and I have a pretty small head, so they might feel tight for a person with a wider head. Overall I'm very happy and would definitely recommend, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota

customer_reviews.title: Excellent worth the £119 paid
customer_reviews.text: Used on iPhone 5s tried a variety of lean a dirty download and YouTube streaming. Excellent results, suits the purpose exceptionally. Comfortable fit with my chunky shades: the ears sit just below the handles, unnoticeable, clever. The packaging and instructions build with most respect to users. Highly recommended. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 14 yo has had wireless headphone on his birthday list for a while and was originally looking at some beats. These however are far more stylish and having looked into both sets he’s opted for these. He hasn’t had them yet, but I liked the look of them so much I got myself a pair too! Good quality headphone, my ears are getting used to having these on rather than the in ear ones I’ve been using for a while. Sound is good and they do seem to cancel out the arguing of 3 children so a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah W.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy these if I were you.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these - first pair Bluetooth was rubbish, second pair battery dies after one song. So frustrating. Least reliable headphones I've owned and amazon tell me I'm outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out external noise like wearing a pair of Howard Leight Laser Lite earplugs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks edgy, details make it look very expensive. Sound is stunning! But my big ears don't fit quite snuggly in the void so feel uncomfortable after a while as they get squashed against my head, but that's not a reflection of the product! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these for one week, and whilst I like them I have unfortunately had to return them. As people have stated, the noise cancelling isn't perfect but it's adequate and not a deal breaker. The battery life is on the lower side, but if you turn them off after use they last much longer (unsurprisingly). However the reason for my return is the fact the hinge on the left ear cup developed a very loud squeak every time it moved. (As shown in the attached video). It's very disappointing, especially after only one week of mild use for about ten hours total.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T. Dawgzone

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these since Saturday. The sound is excellent, they are comfortable (although my ears do get a bit hot after a while). The only problem with them, is that now I am having trouble connecting to Bluetooth. It was fine last night, but now won’t connect. I have reached out to Marshall for tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Kal-El

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I am not a sound freak so I am not commenting on the sound quality as for me it was perfect :) Noise cancellation option works great. It is even a bit dangerous when you are walking on a busy street. Even my noisy neighbors could not get through it. They are very comfy for a long periods of listening. Ears are not heating up which was a huge problem in this type of headphones for me. Design is nice and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Top class bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely essential purchase for me. I have charged the battery only once since I purchase one month ago. Sound is excellent, across a range of genres. The only gripe is that the headband is tight, so after a while of listening it can start to ache across the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing but disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation very low compared to similar priced models. Found the sound to be surprisingly dull over a range of music types. Could really do with it own app with EQ control etc. Found them to also be very uncomfortable which is a real shame as the look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee

customer_reviews.title: Try on your device before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this pair to replace my Philips Fidelio headphones. Sound is a lot better with more depth and detail, the noise cancelling is good enough but there is a major issue with compatibility I use the headphones with a Oneplus 6 phone and the battery always says it's 100%, I tried everything I could think of the including resetting the headphones but the battery always stays at 100% up and including the time I get the audible 3 beeps from the headphones and switch off. I contacted Marshall support and they just said it's a compatibility issue and there is no solution
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these both in sound and noise reduction when flying is staggering. I kept switching the NR off and on just to appreciate how they eliminate the engine noise! They are firm on the ears and I have to move my glasses arms up for them not to hurt but that may just be me with a massive head!
customer_reviews.author: Martyn Wherry

customer_reviews.title: Best Present
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a present for my birthday and I love them. They are so stylish and as I work in an office I feel like they dont look strange when matched with office attire. The noise cancellation is great and blocks out all the noise on my commute. Come with a cute little carrier bag that you can attach a chain handle to do I use this for a handbag as well. Great present
customer_reviews.author: Shan_j

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound quality, love these headphones and I'm so glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, as one of the reviewers said they look like they fell straight out of a Steely Dan Tour Van, and funny enough Im a huge fan of Steely Dan! Anyway I digress. Beautiful mix of lows and highs, you'll hear music in a wonderful way. Value for money, comes very well packaged. Robust build as well. Thank you Marshall for making these. Ended up buying the marshall stanmore II as well and from now on will only use Marshall speakers (having used them as a guitarist)
customer_reviews.author: Allan B

customer_reviews.title: Better than...
customer_reviews.text: I bought Nuraphones to replace these as they had been well-worn and I regret it every day. The sound on these was actually more preferable to me than my (supposedly) personal profile established on the Nuraphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: These are the headphones you’ve been looking for :)
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I’ve had beats before and they without fail have always had problems or broken and I’ve had to return them within a week of use but these are sturdy, fashionable and obviously most importantly give great sound. If you’re on the fence like I was about the purchase I can sincerely recommend taking the leap. I am so impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Reddin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a bit uncomfortable for long usage
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, very clear and precise, a bit uncomfortable for long time usage, mostly on the upper part of the ears. Noise Cancelation is still a technology under development and it can only cancel noises that remain regular instead of several different noises like street noises (cars, people speaking, etc.). Overall really good for the price I got them! Got them under a sale and paid half price of what the brand asks for. Completely satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: José Costa

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice headphones BUT the battery only lasted 35 minutes. It’s difficult to tell if they’re on or off but I made sure that when I took them off charge-charged them overnight- they were turned off. When I turned them back on again the low battery sound would come on and they only lasted 35 minutes. Not happy for the price and will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Have had previous versions of these and these made already good headphones even better. Great sounding, and they fit snuggly over the ears. Bluetooth connects easily.
customer_reviews.author: pr1970

customer_reviews.title: Good sound- rather tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, well made BUT very tight fit. I am female and take a very small hat size. These are on the tight side even for me. I’m not sure how someone with a larger head would cope.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long on ANC+Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, ANC+bluetooth doesn't last long (I wasn't expecting it to last so little) - but either or will last a loooong time. Noise cancelling could be better, it works at about 80% of what I was expecting, but it does make irritable noises more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Locksmith

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, my son is very pleased with this item. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is excellent, Bluetooth sound quality is very good and they are very comfortable to wear. Oddly they don't sound as good when connecting them to my phone with the supplied lead. I've had no complaints whilst using them for hands free calling, one just has to get used to hearing one's own voice through the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Rock on!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, noise cancelling is good if not killing all noise (which I’m happy with) Sound is good, especially for rock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are amazing. The sound is clear and smooth. The battery lasts for 2 weeks of intense use. The only little flaw is about the stiffness of the headphones in contact with the hears, even though the material is extremely soft and with nice quality, it is slightly uncomfortable for a long use.
customer_reviews.author: Tommaso Pardi

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder & value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great product all round. The noise cancelling is more like a focus setting but it's still impressive and I like it. It basically filters out any background noise allowing you to really focus (but not total noise cancellation) big difference when it's switched on/off. Comfort is great (and I have a meat swede for a head) and the sound is well balanced, clear with great depth.
customer_reviews.author: D.Hill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling wasn’t great and considering I have a small head they felt tight.
customer_reviews.author: Marm

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, especially sound quality. Had issues with microphone, amazon replaced them and the new pair seems to work properly. Premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Serhiy

customer_reviews.title: Poor noise cancelling and broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: I was actually really excited to get my first bluetooth and over-ear headphones. I am using premium spotify/highest sound quality settings however I find the tube or traffic noise to be really loud even on maximum volume. Furthermore the headphones broke after a month. The left side stopped working. Overall really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Bought these October 2019 I had them for a few months then they became faulty so I contacted Marshall and sent a pic of the QR code from the headphones only to be told that they were fake I am now waiting on a refund do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ross balmer

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my ears even after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Nice design but had to send it back as it was hurting my ears. Tried them for 2 weeks and my ears were burning as it was painful to hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy ..
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable- high quality sound-excellent noise cancellation.... Very good set of headphones my daughter is very very pleased...
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Really useful to have both the option of Bluetooth or conventional ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, wish I'd have bought them for myself. Really useful to have both the option of Bluetooth or conventional cable connectivity options. A great quality sound too.
customer_reviews.author: ADC

customer_reviews.title: Better than others twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, high and low frequency sound is fantastic. Noise cancellation works. Battery lasts ages and wireless controller and connection is easy. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Leatham

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves them, and he hasn't managed to break them yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Could be a good product but in my case it quit to works after just six months, in the specific it is not longer able to pair with other device, I'm astonished because It never had fallen off and I was always carefully to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is well chuffed with these bad boys. Very comfy and sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shell03

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, poor wear comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, prolonged wear results in sore ears. Although these have awesome sound, they are uncomfortable after about 30 mins, and unbearable after an hour. Never had this issue with other brands, so no idea why Marshall are like this. Maybe if you’ve a narrower head you’d be fine!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Iconic
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous and with the iconic branding . At half price these were a steal. Sound quality for music and tv is top
customer_reviews.author: Iain2012

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable whilst wearing glasses
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes these are great. The only negative is that they are not very comfortable if you wear glasses. Probably true of a lot of headphones to be fair.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sound is good, but if you are looking for something that has more bass I would recommend staying away from this product. The worst thing is how tight and uncomfortable are this headphones, after 5 minutes you start wondering if you are wearing a pair of headphones of a torture instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Slusar

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and was fake - make sure to check when you get them
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Useless after 3 months use!
customer_reviews.text: Barley used for the first 6 months of owning, after 3 months of use, battery is shot, headphones crackle and pop even when switched off!
customer_reviews.author: George harland-smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality price and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband he uses them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. The sound quality is really good and easy to set up and use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Punky..

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, not a great ANC
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and powerful. Might hurt a little in your ears after a few hours with them, and the noise canceling is only OK. It cancels some of the motor noise from planes and trains, but not that much. But is not that bad as well. Mixed fellings.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Marques

customer_reviews.title: Stylish headphones with decent sounds quality.
customer_reviews.text: Much cooler looking headphones than many other. The sound quality is quite decent.
customer_reviews.author: Sneha

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Love the quality of the sound and the noise cancelling works great in the office. The headphones are on-ear, but I find them comfortable. Usually use them for my walk on the way to office. They are very stylish too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones, but high price point
customer_reviews.text: Good earphones, although I’m glad I got these at half the price. Considering I had the Major II version before at a much cheaper price, I don’t think the Mid A.N.C is that elevated in terms of quality to warrant a step price hike.
customer_reviews.author: remrems

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and battery life. Overall excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I've had these now for a good three months and have charged them maybe three times and not from lack of listening. The battery life is simply stunning. Excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Rehn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before.. but honestly the battery life is 2 songs PLEASE DON'T BUY THESES..want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Marshall ANC for the most demanding
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectations , clear sound deep base , long lasting battery and very fast charging . For someone who loves to listen a lot it is an ideal pair of high quality headphones I certainly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Konrad

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but top sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small no matter your head size. After using them a couple of hours your head is gonna hurt for a while. Literally uncomfortable to wear even if they are size adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Codrut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Quality headphones.. noise cancellation could be better..only cuts out top range.
customer_reviews.author: miss r l holloway

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of kit. Looks robust, sounds very well, especially with Rock and Dance music. The headphones are very comfortable and the bluetooth connection is very stable. Pairing the Mid is a piece of cake. I haven't tried making phone calls with the set, yet.
customer_reviews.author: RAJ van Hilten

customer_reviews.title: Not advised
customer_reviews.text: Battery is terrible. If I take it off charge and leave it off for 2 days then use them I don’t get 3 hours use. Absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Endless battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I used them everyday for at least 2h with Bluetooth + I use them with the cable on my amp when I play the guitar. Endless battery life, really good volume.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the build and style. Soft and comfortable to wear. Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Washington

customer_reviews.title: Sound good but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty decent, but I found them to be really uncomfortable. Compared to other headphones these were really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. Comfortable and good looking. Sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Clark

customer_reviews.title: Faukty
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after less then 2 months and can't return it now..absolutely fuming
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wood and Djuri van der Schaar

customer_reviews.title: ... late so had to be returned but these are great quality headphones for the
customer_reviews.text: arrived too late so had to be returned but these are great quality headphones for the price
customer_reviews.author: mrs k storey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, quality is superb!
customer_reviews.text: Quality wise is absolutely superb! I love it! Comfort is what I am trying to get used to because it seems tight when worn but other than that it's really good :)
customer_reviews.author: Muneka

customer_reviews.title: My favourites.
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily and I’m so impressed with them. They are fantastic quality and worth the money absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: RachelImogen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Noise cancelling is really good too, probably not as good as some as they are on ear not over ear but I prefer that!
customer_reviews.author: Hayl

customer_reviews.title: Rockin’ Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, perfect for the sort of music I listen to! The noise cancelling works great, the battery life is generous and they sit well on your head. Stylish and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hill

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Bass isn't as good, no noise cancellation. Other than that all good
customer_reviews.author: Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: They’re nice headphones but I guess as the ones I got were used, they were kinda scratched up on the metal and it’s just been getting worse and worse.. the sound is pretty good from them though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Superbly comfortable ear phones, good noise cancelling capabilities but I am experiencing feedback when using with auxiliary cable (Bluetooth is excellent)
customer_reviews.author: Carl Disley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for all styles of music,fits nice and tight,very well built
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: supersonic
customer_reviews.text: a little bit tight, but super quality (mine is original)
customer_reviews.author: Geza

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones that look great and have the sound quality to match.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew martin

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, equivalent to ~£50 pair of wired over ears. Control knob is fiddly and often ignores the direction you move it. Comfy to wear for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent altho mike variable

customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth connectivity with other devices is poor. I expected better from this manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really start to hurt after wearing for an hour, pinching ears and making them numb and, I don't have a big head, I wear a medium crash helmet.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair
customer_reviews.text: Amazing design and comfort! About sound you will be surprised especially with real instruments and movie sound effects!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound Quality - Lack of comfort and volume
customer_reviews.text: They sound good but not loud. There is a lack of base. Also, I have to take them off every 10 - 15 mins as the cushions "stick" on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition nevertheless
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a warehouse deal. Excellent condition nevertheless. As for the music, superb as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Sub U.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery & quality headphone. It hasn’t let me down in 10months.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great. Battery life is amazing (up to 30 hrs).
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Battery life is amazing (up to 30 hrs). Design and construction quality is really good. I've been using them for a few months now, almost every day and more than happy.

product_meta.title: Marshall Mid Bluetooth Headphones - Black, 1
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Mid| Colour Name:Black

"Mid is a premium Bluetooth AptX headphone that delivers superior audio and 30+ hours of playtime on a single charge. Its custom 40 mm dynamic drivers lend it a robust sound that balances clarity with just the right amount of bass – perfect for those who demand the best in sound.

The on-ear design features a plush headband and 3D hinges that produce an ergonomic fit. Complete with black vinyl, solid metal hinges and brass details mid is the embodiment of Marshall in a headphone."



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Mid Bluetooth Headphones; 1 x 3.5mm Cord Cable; 1 x USB Charging Cable; 1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: Bluetooth aptX gives you the freedom of a wireless headphone
Mid features custom tuned drivers for superior audio
Mid is all Rock ‘N’ Roll with modern features, rugged styling and timeless design
The multidirectional knob lets you control your music and phone functionality with ease
